name: francoisbuys.com
description: This is my little piece of the internet. I like to think of it as a digital garden. A landscape of tidbits that I find interesting or useful.
author: Francois Buys <buys.fran@gmail.com>

scripts.start: npx gulp && concurrently "npx gulp watch" "npx eleventy --serve"
scripts.production: NODE_ENV=production npx gulp && NODE_ENV=production npx eleventy
